scripts.clean-pkgs: rm -fr packages/**/node_modules packages/**/.turbo packages/**/dist/* && mkdir -p packages/miolo-demo/dist/cli && mkdir -p packages/miolo-demo/dist/server
scripts.reset: npm run clean-root && npm run clean-pkgs && npm i && turbo telemetry disable
scripts.publish-miolo: cd ./packages/miolo && npm run dist && npm publish && cd ../..
scripts.publish-miolo-cli: cd ./packages/miolo-cli && npm run dist && npm publish && cd ../..
scripts.publish-miolo-react: cd ./packages/miolo-react && npm run dist && npm publish && cd ../..
scripts.publish-all: npm run site && npm run publish-miolo && npm run publish-miolo-cli && npm run publish-miolo-react
